salon.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a place where you can get your hair cut, have beauty treatments etc
salon.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a shop where fashionable and expensive clothes are sold
salon.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a room in a very large house, where people can meet and talk
salon.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a regular meeting of famous people at which they talk about art, literature, or music, popular in the past in France
